message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9500. I think it's a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value of the product to me, I would like to propose a price of $8200. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. While I appreciate your offer, $8200 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $9000, which still gives you a good deal.  Let me know if that works for you.

I understand your position, Alice. Thank you for adjusting your offer. Based on my assessment, I believe $8700 would be a fair price for me to pay for the product. I hope we can reach an agreement that satisfies both of us.
